ingredients.item: 300g No.1 Jack Hawkins Tomatoes, halved and cut into thick slices

instructions.step: Put the onion in a small bowl, toss with the white wine vinegar and a pinch of salt then set aside for 5-10 minutes.

Put all the ingredients for the dressing in a clean screw-top jar and shake to mix. Put the lentils, radishes, spinach, gherkin and soaked onions in a bowl and pour the dressing over. Toss everything together.
Add the tomatoes and gently stir through the lentils and most of the dill. Tip out onto a serving platter and scatter with the remaining dill to serve.
